text: adudagi Abraham-na landagi lourakpa pot pumnamak adudagi saruk tara thokpagi ama mahakna mangonda pirammi. (Melchizedek haiba ming asigi wahanthokti ahanbada “Achumba chatpagi Ningthou” haibani aduga mahakna Salem-gi ningthou oibagi maramna mahakki minggi wahanthok amadi “Ingthabagi Ningthou” haibani.)
